title: Looking for an Inner Function
text: The first step is to look for a function inside a function in the formula for f(x).
speech: The first step is to look for a function inside a function in the formula for f(x).
pacedSpeech: The first step is to look for a function inside a function in the formula for f(x).

title: Inner Function
speech: The function contains the expression  fraction, 8 plus x cubed, over, 8 minus x cubed,  .
pacedSpeech: The function contains the expression   fraction, 8 plus x cubed, over, 8 minus x cubed,

title: Outer Function
text: The expression $$\frac{8+x^3}{8-x^3}$$ is then raised to the fourth power.
speech: The expression  fraction, 8 plus x cubed, over, 8 minus x cubed,   is then raised to the fourth power.
pacedSpeech: The expression   fraction, 8 plus x cubed, over, 8 minus x cubed,
is then raised to the fourth power.

title: Answer
speech: g of x is equal to fraction, 8 plus x cubed, over, 8 minus x cubed,  ,  f of x is equal to x to the fourth
pacedSpeech: g of x is equal to fraction, 8 plus x cubed, over, 8 minus x cubed,
,   f of x is equal to x to the fourth
